nodes.name: append_required_macros
nodes.cmd:
echo "BAM_READCOUNT=#BAM_READCOUNT#" >> required.macros
echo "BAM_READCOUNT_PARAMS=#BAM_READCOUNT_PARAMS#" >> required.macros
echo "BED_FILE=#BED_FILE#" >> required.macros
echo "BWA=#BWA#" >> required.macros
echo "FILTER_COV=#FILTER_COV#" >> required.macros
echo "FILTER_HOM=#FILTER_HOM#" >> required.macros
echo "FILTER_VAF=#FILTER_VAF#" >> required.macros
echo "GATK4=#GATK4#" >> required.macros
echo "GATK4_BASERECALIBRATE_PARAMS=#GATK4_BASERECALIBRATE_PARAMS#" >> required.macros
echo "NORMAL_BARCODE=#NORMAL_BARCODE#" >> required.macros
echo "NORMAL_R1=#NORMAL_R1#" >> required.macros
echo "NORMAL_R2=#NORMAL_R2#" >> required.macros
echo "PICARD=#PICARD#" >> required.macros
echo "PICARD_JAVA_OPTS=#PICARD_JAVA_OPTS#" >> required.macros
echo "PINDEL=#PINDEL#" >> required.macros
echo "PINDEL2VCF=#PINDEL2VCF#" >> required.macros
echo "PINDEL_PARAMS=#PINDEL_PARAMS#" >> required.macros
echo "PLATFORM=#PLATFORM#" >> required.macros
echo "REF=#REF#" >> required.macros
echo "REFDATE=#REFDATE#" >> required.macros
echo "REFNAME=#REFNAME#" >> required.macros
echo "SAMPLE_NAME=#SAMPLE_NAME#" >> required.macros
echo "SAMTOOLS=#SAMTOOLS#" >> required.macros
echo "SAMTOOLS_MPILEUP_PARAMS=#SAMTOOLS_MPILEUP_PARAMS#" >> required.macros
echo "SNPSIFT=#SNPSIFT#" >> required.macros
echo "SNPSIFT_FILTER_STATEMENT=#SNPSIFT_FILTER_STATEMENT#" >> required.macros
echo "SNPSIFT_JAVA_OPTS=#SNPSIFT_JAVA_OPTS#" >> required.macros
echo "STRELKA=#STRELKA#" >> required.macros
echo "STRELKA_IS_WES=#STRELKA_IS_WES#" >> required.macros
echo "TEST_SOMATIC_R=#TEST_SOMATIC_R#" >> required.macros
echo "THREAD=#THREAD#" >> required.macros
echo "TMP=#TMP#" >> required.macros
echo "TUMOR_BARCODE=#TUMOR_BARCODE#" >> required.macros

echo "VARSCAN_FPFILTER_PARAMS=#VARSCAN_FPFILTER_PARAMS#" >> required.macros

echo "VARSCAN_PROCESS_SOMATIC_INDEL_PARAMS=#VARSCAN_PROCESS_SOMATIC_INDEL_PARAMS#" >> required.macros
